name: flat-cache
description: A stupidly simple key/value storage using files to persist some data

1.0.0.name: flat-cache
1.0.0.description: A stupidly simple key/value storage using files to persist the data

scripts.watch: watch-run -i -p 'test/specs/**/*.js' istanbul cover test/runner.js html text-summary

1.0.6.name: flat-cache
1.0.6.description: A stupidly simple key/value storage using files to persist some data

scripts.lint: npm run beautify && npm run eslint
scripts.verify: npm run beautify-check && npm run eslint
scripts.install-hooks: prepush install && changelogx install-hook && precommit install
scripts.do-changelog: npm run changelog && git add ./changelog.md && git commit -m 'DOC: Generate changelog' --no-verify
scripts.post-v: npm run do-changelog && git push --no-verify && git push --tags --no-verify
scripts.bump-major: npm run pre-v && npm version major -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-v && npm version minor -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-v && npm version patch -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.watch: watch-run -i -p 'test/specs/**/*.js' istanbul cover test/runner.js html text-summary

1.0.10.name: flat-cache
1.0.10.description: A stupidly simple key/value storage using files to persist some data

scripts.autofix: npm run beautify && npm run eslint-fix
scripts.check: npm run beautify-check && npm run eslint
scripts.verify: npm run check && npm run test:cache
scripts.install-hooks: prepush install && changelogx install-hook && precommit install
scripts.do-changelog: npm run changelog && git add ./changelog.md && git commit -m 'DOC: Generate changelog' --no-verify
scripts.post-v: npm run do-changelog && git push --no-verify && git push --tags --no-verify
scripts.bump-major: npm run pre-v && npm version major -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-v && npm version minor -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-v && npm version patch -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.watch: watch-run -i -p 'test/specs/**/*.js' istanbul cover test/runner.js html text-summary
